Opinion
Per Curiam,
Appeal quashed. Cf. Commonwealth v. Wrona, 442 Pa. 201, 275 A. 2d 78 (1971).
Mr. Chief . Justice Bell wouM dismiss the appeal for the reásons given in his concurring opinion filed in Commonwealth v. Wrona.
